d:
It has been a while since I did an animation... and what a return! I'd say this is my first 10/10 animation. I absolutely LOVE how this turned out, the animation is smooth, tits are bouncy, the girls look amazing good nothing not to love! I guess, the only thing I have to complain is that I hate GIF's 256 color limitation (Does anyone know a workaround this?)

Date: October 2025

Artist: https://x.com/jonatha71727528
n: [Western] DP Animation #9 - Jill Valentine & Elaine Marley [Blue Pigment]
